title: Vegetarian Paella
description: Veggie version of a Spanish classic found on the back of a paella pan box
instructions: Put broth on low heat in saucepan. Add saffron and paprika. Salt to taste.
In pan, sear oyster mushrooms in 2 tbsp olive oil (do not fully cook). Remove.
Add onion, peppers, parsley, tomato and garlic to pan.
Cook for 5 minutes on medium high.
Add rice and remaining oil. Cook 3 minutes, stirring.
Pour broth from saucepan into paella pan. Bring to a boil.
After this point, do not stir. Lower heat to a simmer for 10 minutes.
Nestle browned mushrooms evenly in rice.
Do not stir. Simmer another 10 minutes.
When rice sizzles, remove pan from heat and cover with a cloth for 10 minutes before serving.
Serve with lemon wedges and alioli sauce.
